DOC.brief_title: Relationships Between GLP-2 Markers Bone Turnover Following Feeding
DOC.detailed_description: Study objective : 1 . To determine difference baseline serum level GLP-2 related difference bone microarchitecture , structure strength distal tibia distal radius obese lean premenopausal female . 2 . To determine whether obesity premenopausal female influence level circulate GLP-2 follow standardise glucose meal resultant change marker bone formation resorption 3 . To test whether GLP-2 directly affect osteoclast function via identifiable receptor
